nodes.text: A human female was the niece and handmaiden of Queen Réillata. In 28 BBY,[source?] she attended Réillata's second coronation at the Theed Royal Palace, and as her aunt descended a set of stairs, she followed behind. After Réillata reached the palace's throne room, the niece and two other handmaidens waited at the door whilst Réillata took the throne. Saché, a handmaiden of Réillata's predecessor Padmé Amidala, noted that Réillata's niece was younger than she had been when she entered Amidala's service.
